title: IPL Scoreboard
text: April 30, 2018 / 6:12 PM / Updated 25 minutes ago IPL first day of match 30 between Chennai Super Kings and Delhi Daredevils on Monday at Pune, India Chennai Super Kings win by 13 runs Chennai Super Kings 1st innings Shane Watson c Liam Plunkett b Amit Mishra 78 Faf du Plessis c Trent Boult b Vijay Shankar 33 Suresh Raina b Glenn Maxwell 1 Ambati Rayudu Run Out Trent Boult 41 MS Dhoni Not Out 51 Extras 1b 2lb 1nb 0pen 3w 7 Total (20.0 overs) 211-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-102 du Plessis, 2-103 Raina, 3-130 Watson, 4-209 Rayudu Did Not Bat : Jadeja, Bravo, Sharma, Singh, Asif, Ngidi Trent Boult 4 0 48 0 12.00 Avesh Khan 4 0 28 0 7.00 1w Rahul Tewatia 2 0 23 0 11.50 Liam Plunkett 3 0 52 0 17.33 Amit Mishra 4 0 30 1 7.50 Vijay Shankar 2 0 22 1 11.00 2w 1nb Glenn Maxwell 1 0 5 1 5.00 Delhi Daredevils 1st innings Prithvi Shaw c Ravindra Jadeja b KM Asif 9 Colin Munro c Karn Sharma b KM Asif 26 Shreyas Iyer Run Out Shane Watson 13 Rishabh Pant c Ravindra Jadeja b Lungi Ngidi 79 Glenn Maxwell b Ravindra Jadeja 6 Vijay Shankar Not Out 54 Rahul Tewatia Not Out 3 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 6w 8 Total (20.0 overs) 198-5 Fall of Wickets : 1-10 Shaw, 2-46 Munro, 3-64 Iyer, 4-74 Maxwell, 5-162 Pant Did Not Bat : Plunkett, Mishra, Khan, Boult Lungi Ngidi 4 0 26 1 6.50 2w KM Asif 3 0 43 2 14.33 1w Shane Watson 2 0 27 0 13.50 Ravindra Jadeja 4 0 31 1 7.75 1w Harbhajan Singh 4 0 26 0 6.50 1w Dwayne Bravo 3 0 43 0 14.33 1w Umpire Anil Dandekar Umpire Chettithody Shamsuddin Video C Nandan Match Referee Vengalil Kutty
